thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Ferdie

author: Ferdie
title: Ferdie
text: This company do have excellent customer service. I personally experienced my two orders that get lost in the local post office. Banggood immediately offered either refund or re send, no further questions. They just once asked to re check with the post office. In return, I immediately advised them and paid appropriately when the parts arrived after two months ( not Banggood fault ). I am confident to order again and again in the future
